adjectives.description: minimalist (comparative more minimalist, superlative most minimalist)

entries.meaning: Believing in or seeking a minimal state; seeking to minimize or reduce to a minimum.
examples: I am sure such a minimalist style of furniture would never fit well with my packrat nature.

entries.meaning: One who believes in or seeks a minimal state; one who seeks to minimize or reduce to a minimum.
examples: He's a minimalist: when it comes to formal processes, the fewer the better.
